request.description:
# API Description For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470248) :::info[Description] Get a list of recent fills. If you need to get your recent trade history with low latency, please query endpoint Get List of Orders Completed in 24h. The requested data is not real-time. ::: **Data Time Range** The system allows you to retrieve data up to one week (start from the last day by default). If the time period of the queried data exceeds one week (time range from the start time to end time exceeded 24*7 hours), the system will prompt to remind you that you have exceeded the time limit. If you only specified the start time, the system will automatically calculate the end time (end time = start time + 24 hours). On the contrary, if you only specified the end time, the system will calculate the start time (start time= end time - 24 hours) the same way. **Fee** Orders on KuCoin Futures platform are classified into two types, taker and maker. A taker order matches other resting orders on the exchange order book, and gets executed immediately after order entry. A maker order, on the contrary, stays on the exchange order book and awaits to be matched. Taker orders will be charged taker fees, while maker orders will receive maker rebates. Please note that market orders, iceberg orders and hidden orders are always charged taker fees. The system will pre-freeze a predicted taker fee when you place an order.The liquidity field indicates if the fill was charged taker or maker fees. The system will pre-freeze the predicted fees (including the maintenance margin needed for the position, entry fees and fees to close positions) if you added the position, and will not pre-freeze fees if you reduced the position. After the order is executed, if you added positions, the system will deduct entry fees from your balance, if you closed positions, the system will deduct the close fees. # API Schema ## Request Schema **Request Body** --- **None** --- ## Response Schema **Response Body** --- **root Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | code | string | | | data | object | Refer to the schema section of data | **root.data Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | currentPage | integer | | | pageSize | integer | | | totalNum | integer | | | totalPage | integer | | | items | array | Refer to the schema section of items | **root.data.items Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220) | | tradeId | string | Trade ID
| | orderId | string | Order ID
| | side | string | Transaction side | | liquidity | string | Liquidity- taker or maker | | forceTaker | boolean | Whether to force processing as a taker
| | price | string | Filled price | | size | integer | Filled amount | | value | string | Order value | | openFeePay | string | Opening transaction fee | | closeFeePay | string | Closing transaction fee | | stop | string | A mark to the stop order type | | feeRate | string | Fee Rate | | fixFee | string | Fixed fees(Deprecated field, no actual use of the value field) | | feeCurrency | string | Charging currency | | tradeTime | integer | trade time in nanosecond | | subTradeType | string | Deprecated field, no actual use of the value field | | marginMode | string | Margin mode: ISOLATED (isolated), CROSS (cross margin). | | settleCurrency | string | Settle Currency | | displayType | string | Order Type | | fee | string | | | orderType | string | Order type | | tradeType | string | Trade type (trade, liquid, adl or settlement)
| | createdAt | integer | Time the order created
| ---

# API Description For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470252) :::info[Description] Get the position details of a specified position. ::: # API Schema ## Request Schema **Request Body** --- **None** --- ## Response Schema **Response Body** --- **root Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | code | string | | | data | object | Refer to the schema section of data | **root.data Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | id | string | Position ID
| | symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220) | | crossMode | boolean | Whether it is cross margin. | | delevPercentage | number | ADL ranking percentile
| | openingTimestamp | integer | Open time
| | currentTimestamp | integer | Current timestamp
| | currentQty | integer | Current postion quantity
| | currentCost | number | Current postion value
| | currentComm | number | Current commission
| | unrealisedCost | number | Unrealised value
| | realisedGrossCost | number | Accumulated realised gross profit value
| | realisedCost | number | Current realised position value
| | isOpen | boolean | Opened position or not
| | markPrice | number | Mark price
| | markValue | number | Mark Value
| | posCost | number | Position value
| | posInit | number | Inital margin Cross = opening value/cross leverage; isolated = accumulation of initial margin for each transaction
| | posMargin | number | Bankruptcy cost Cross = mark value * imr; Isolated = position margin (accumulation of initial margin, additional margin, generated funding fees, etc.)
| | realisedGrossPnl | number | Accumulated realised gross profit value
| | realisedPnl | number | Realised profit and loss
| | unrealisedPnl | number | Unrealised profit and loss
| | unrealisedPnlPcnt | number | Profit-loss ratio of the position
| | unrealisedRoePcnt | number | Rate of return on investment
| | avgEntryPrice | number | Average entry price
| | liquidationPrice | number | Liquidation price For Cross Margin, you can refer to the liquidationPrice, and the liquidation is based on the risk rate.
| | bankruptPrice | number | Bankruptcy price For Cross Margin, you can refer to the bankruptPrice, and the liquidation is based on the risk rate.
| | settleCurrency | string | Currency used to clear and settle the trades
| | isInverse | boolean | Reverse contract or not
| | marginMode | string | Margin Mode: CROSS，ISOLATED
| | positionSide | string | Position Side
| | leverage | number | Leverage | | autoDeposit | boolean | Auto deposit margin or not **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | maintMarginReq | number | Maintenance margin requirement **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | riskLimit | integer | Risk limit **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | realLeverage | number | Leverage of the order **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | posCross | number | added margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | posCrossMargin | integer | Additional margin calls (automatic, manual, adjusted risk limits) **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | posComm | number | Bankruptcy cost **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | posCommCommon | number | Part of bankruptcy cost (positioning, add margin) **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | posLoss | number | Funding fees paid out **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | posFunding | number | The current remaining unsettled funding fee for the position **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | posMaint | number | Maintenance margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | maintMargin | number | Position margin **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| | maintainMargin | number | Maintenance margin rate **Only applicable to Isolated Margin**
| ---

| | riskLimit | integer | Risk limit
| | realLeverage | number | Leverage o the order | | crossMode | boolean | Cross mode or not | | delevPercentage | number | ADL ranking percentile | | openingTimestamp | integer | Open time | | currentTimestamp | integer | Current timestamp
| | currentQty | integer | Current postion quantity | | currentCost | number | Current postion value | | currentComm | number | Current commission | | unrealisedCost | number | Unrealised value | | realisedGrossCost | number | Accumulated realised gross profit value | | realisedCost | number | Current realised position value | | isOpen | boolean | Opened position or not | | markPrice | number | Mark price | | markValue | number | Mark value
| | posCost | number | Position value | | posCross | number | added margin | | posInit | number | Leverage margin | | posComm | number | Bankruptcy cost | | posLoss | number | Funding fees paid out | | posMargin | number | Position margin | | posMaint | number | Maintenance margin | | maintMargin | number | Position margin | | realisedGrossPnl | number | Accumulated realised gross profit value | | realisedPnl | number | Realised profit and loss | | unrealisedPnl | number | Unrealised profit and loss | | unrealisedPnlPcnt | number | Profit-loss ratio of the position | | unrealisedRoePcnt | number | Rate of return on investment | | avgEntryPrice | number | Average entry price | | liquidationPrice | number | Liquidation price | | bankruptPrice | number | Bankruptcy price | | userId | integer | userId | | settleCurrency | string | Currency used to clear and settle the trades | ---

# API Description For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470264) :::info[Description] This interface is for the adjustment of the risk limit level(Only valid for isolated Margin). The result of the adjustment can be achieved by WebSocket information: Position Change Events ::: # API Schema ## Request Schema **Request Body** --- **root Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220) | | level | integer | level | --- ## Response Schema **Response Body** --- **root Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | code | string | | | data | boolean | To adjust the level will cancel the open order, the response can only indicate whether the submit of the adjustment request is successful or not.
| ---

# API Description For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470267) :::info[Description] Submit request to get the funding history. ::: :::tip[Tips] The **from time** and **to time** range cannot exceed 3 month. An error will occur if the specified time window exceeds the range. If only **from time** is entered, the default **to time** is the current time. If it exceeds 3 months, an error will be reported. If only **to time** is entered, the system will automatically calculate the start time as end time minus 3month. ::: # API Schema ## Request Schema **Request Body** --- **None** --- ## Response Schema **Response Body** --- **root Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | code | string | | | data | object | Refer to the schema section of data | **root.data Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | dataList | array | Refer to the schema section of dataList | | hasMore | boolean | Whether there are more pages
| **root.data.dataList Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | id | integer | id | | symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220) | | timePoint | integer | Time point (milisecond)
| | fundingRate | number | Funding rate
| | markPrice | number | Mark price
| | positionQty | integer | Position size | | positionCost | number | Position value at settlement period
| | funding | number | Settled funding fees. A positive number means that the user received the funding fee, and vice versa.
| | settleCurrency | string | settlement currency
| | context | string | context | | marginMode | string | Margin mode: ISOLATED (isolated), CROSS (cross margin). | ---

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470269)

:::info[Description]
This endpoint can get redemption preview information by holding ID. If the current holding is fully redeemed or in the process of being redeemed, it indicates that the holding does not exist.
:::
# API Schema

## Request Schema


**Request Body**

---
  **None**  
---
## Response Schema


**Response Body**

**root Schema**

| name | type | description |

| data | object | Refer to the schema section of data |

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| currency | string | currency |
| redeemAmount | string | Expected redemption amount |
| penaltyInterestAmount | string | Penalty interest amount, incurred for early redemption of fixed-term products |
| redeemPeriod | integer | Redemption waiting period (days) |
| deliverTime | integer | Expected deliver time (milliseconds) |
| manualRedeemable | boolean | Whether manual redemption is possible |
| redeemAll | boolean | Whether the entire holding must be redeemed, required for early redemption of fixed-term products |

# API Description

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470271)

:::info[Description]
This endpoint can get available savings products. If no products are available, an empty list is returned.
:::
# API Schema

## Request Schema


**Request Body**

---
  **None**  
---
## Response Schema


**Response Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| code | string |  |
| data | array | Refer to the schema section of data |

**root.data Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | string | Product ID |
| currency | string | currency |
| category | string | Product category: DEMAND (savings) |
| type | string | Product subtype: TIME (fixed), DEMAND (demand) |
| precision | integer | Maximum precision supported |
| productUpperLimit | string | Products total subscribe amount |
| userUpperLimit | string | Max user subscribe amount |
| userLowerLimit | string | Min user subscribe amount |
| redeemPeriod | integer | Redemption waiting period (days) |
| lockStartTime | integer | Product earliest interest start time, in milliseconds |
| lockEndTime | integer | Product maturity time, in milliseconds |
| applyStartTime | integer | Subscription start time, in milliseconds |
| applyEndTime | integer | Subscription end time, in milliseconds |
| returnRate | string | Annualized Rate of Return, for example, 0.035 is equal to 3.5% annualized rate of return |
| incomeCurrency | string | Income currency |
| earlyRedeemSupported | integer | Whether the fixed product supports early redemption: 0 (no), 1 (yes) |
| productRemainAmount | string | Products remain subscribe amount |
| status | string | Product status: ONGOING(Subscription in progress), PENDING(Preheating Subscription), FULL(Subscribed), INTERESTING (Interest in progress) |
| redeemType | string | Redemption channel: MANUAL (manual redemption), TRANS_DEMAND (transfer to corresponding demand product upon maturity), AUTO (redeem to funding account upon maturity) |
| incomeReleaseType | string | Income release type: DAILY (daily release), AFTER (release after product ends) |
| interestDate | integer | Most recent interest date(millisecond) |
| duration | integer | Product duration (days) |
| newUserOnly | integer | Whether the product is exclusive for new users: 0 (no), 1 (yes) |

---

| UID                 | User's UID        | 6345466  |
| BizLine             | Business Line(Spot、Futures) | Spot |
| Volume              | Volume            | 0        |
| TotalCommission     | Total Commission = BrokerCommission + UserCommission + AffiliateCommission | 0        |

# API Description

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470293)

:::info[Description]
This endpoint supports fund transfer between Broker account and Broker sub-accounts.

Please be aware that withdrawal from sub-account is not directly supported. Broker has to transfer funds from broker sub-account to broker account to initiate the withdrawals.
:::
# API Schema

## Request Schema


**Request Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| currency | string | Currency |
| amount | string | Transfer Amount (must be a positive integer in the currency's precision) |
| direction | string | Fund transfer direction: OUT (Broker account is transferred to Broker sub-account), IN (Broker sub-account is transferred to Broker account) |
| accountType | string | Broker account types: MAIN (Funding account), TRADE (Spot trading account) |
| specialUid | string | Broker subaccount uid, must be the Broker subaccount created by the current Broker user. |
| specialAccountType | string | Broker sub-account types: MAIN (Funding account), TRADE (Spot trading account) |
| clientOid | string | Client Order Id, The unique identifier created by the client. It is recommended to use UUID. The maximum length is 128 bits. |

---
## Response Schema


**Response Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| code | string |  |
| data | object | Refer to the schema section of data |

**root.data Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| orderId | string |  |

---

| amount | string | Transfer Amount |
| fromUid | integer | UID of the user transferring out |
| fromAccountType | string | From Account Type:Account Type: MAIN, TRADE, CONTRACT, MARGIN, ISOLATED |
| fromAccountTag | string | Trading pair, required if the account type is ISOLATED, e.g., BTC-USDT |
| toUid | integer | UID of the user transferring in |
| toAccountType | string | Account Type:Account Type: MAIN, TRADE, CONTRACT, MARGIN, ISOLATED |

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470281)

:::info[Description]
This interface supports downloading Broker rebate orders
:::

### Excel Response

| Param               | Description       | Example  |
| ------------------- | ----------------- |--------- |
| Date                | Date              | 2024/9/1 |
| BrokerUID           | Broker's UID      | 3243241  |
| AffiliateUID        | Affiliate's UID   | 2354546  |
| UID                 | User's UID        | 6345466  |
| BizLine             | Business Line(Spot、Futures) | Spot |
| Volume              | Volume            | 0        |
| TotalCommission     | Total Commission = BrokerCommission + UserCommission + AffiliateCommission | 0        |
| BrokerCommission    | Broker Commission | 0 |
| UserCommission      | User Commission   | 0 |
| AffiliateCommission | Affiliate Commission | 0 |

request.description:
# API Description

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470363)

:::info[Description]
Place order to the futures trading system, you can place two major types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified.
:::

:::tip[Tips]
The maximum limit orders for a single contract is 100 per account, and the maximum stop orders for a single contract is 200 per account.
:::
# API Schema

## Request Schema


**Request Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| clientOid | string | Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, the maximum length cannot exceed 40, e.g. UUID, Only allows numbers, characters, underline(_), and separator(-) |
| side | string | specify if the order is to 'buy' or 'sell'  |
| symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)  |
| leverage | integer | Used to calculate the margin to be frozen for the order. If you are to close the position, this parameter is not required. |
| type | string | specify if the order is an 'limit' order or 'market' order |
| remark | string | remark for the order, length cannot exceed 100 utf8 characters |
| stop | string | Either 'down' or 'up'.  If stop is used,parameter stopPrice and stopPriceType also need to be provieded. |
| stopPriceType | string | Either 'TP', 'IP' or 'MP', Need to be defined if stop is specified. |
| stopPrice | string | Need to be defined if stop is specified.  |
| reduceOnly | boolean | A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true. If set to true, only the orders reducing the position size will be executed. If the reduce-only order size exceeds the position size, the extra size will be canceled. |
| closeOrder | boolean | A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. If closeOrder is set to true, the system will close the position and the position size will become 0. Side, Size and Leverage fields can be left empty and the system will determine the side and size automatically. |
| forceHold | boolean | A mark to forcely hold the funds for an order, even though it's an order to reduce the position size. This helps the order stay on the order book and not get canceled when the position size changes. Set to false by default. The system will forcely freeze certain amount of funds for this order, including orders whose direction is opposite to the current positions. This feature is to ensure that the order won’t be canceled by the matching engine in such a circumstance that not enough funds are frozen for the order. |
| marginMode | string | Margin mode: ISOLATED, CROSS, default: ISOLATED |
| price | string | Required for type is 'limit' order, indicating the operating price |
| size | integer | Order size (Lot), must be a positive integer. The quantity unit of coin-swap contracts is size(lot), and other units are not supported. |
| timeInForce | string | Optional for type is 'limit' order, [Time in force](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146) is a special strategy used during trading, default is GTC |
| postOnly | boolean | Optional for type is 'limit' order,  post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC. When postOnly is true, not allowed choose hidden or iceberg. The post-only flag ensures that the trader always pays the maker fee and provides liquidity to the order book. If any part of the order is going to pay taker fee, the order will be fully rejected. |
| hidden | boolean | Optional for type is 'limit' order, orders not displaying in order book. When hidden chose, not allowed choose postOnly. |
| iceberg | boolean | Optional for type is 'limit' order, Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book. When iceberg chose, not allowed choose postOnly. |
| visibleSize | string | Optional for type is 'limit' order, The maximum visible size of an iceberg order. please place order in size (lots), The units of qty (base currency) and valueQty (value) are not supported. |

---
## Response Schema


**Response Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| code | string |  |
| data | object | Refer to the schema section of data |

**root.data Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| orderId | string | The unique order id generated by the trading system,which can be used later for further actions such as canceling the order. |
| clientOid | string | The user self-defined order id. |

---

# API Description

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470618)

:::info[Description]
Order test endpoint, the request parameters and return parameters of this endpoint are exactly the same as the order endpoint, and can be used to verify whether the signature is correct and other operations. After placing an order, the order will not enter the matching system, and the order cannot be queried.
:::

| stopPriceType | string | Either 'TP', 'IP' or 'MP', Need to be defined if stop is specified. |

| reduceOnly | boolean | A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true. If set to true, only the orders reducing the position size will be executed. If the reduce-only order size exceeds the position size, the extra size will be canceled. |

This feature is to ensure that the order won’t be canceled by the matching engine in such a circumstance that not enough funds are frozen for the order. |

**Response Body**

item.name: Add Take Profit And Stop Loss Order

request.description:
# API Description

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470619)

:::info[Description]
Place take profit and stop loss order supports both take-profit and stop-loss functions, and other functions are exactly the same as the place order interface.

You can place two types of orders: limit and market. Orders can only be placed if your account has sufficient funds. Once an order is placed, your funds will be put on hold for the duration of the order. The amount of funds on hold depends on the order type and parameters specified.

Please be noted that the system would hold the fees from the orders entered the orderbook in advance. 
:::
# API Schema

## Request Schema


**Request Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| clientOid | string | Unique order id created by users to identify their orders, the maximum length cannot exceed 40, e.g. UUID, Only allows numbers, characters, underline(_), and separator(-) |
| side | string | specify if the order is to 'buy' or 'sell' |
| symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220)  |
| leverage | integer | Used to calculate the margin to be frozen for the order. If you are to close the position, this parameter is not required. |
| type | string | specify if the order is an 'limit' order or 'market' order |
| remark | string | remark for the order, length cannot exceed 100 utf8 characters |
| stopPriceType | string | Either 'TP', 'IP' or 'MP' |
| reduceOnly | boolean | A mark to reduce the position size only. Set to false by default. Need to set the position size when reduceOnly is true. If set to true, only the orders reducing the position size will be executed. If the reduce-only order size exceeds the position size, the extra size will be canceled. |
| closeOrder | boolean | A mark to close the position. Set to false by default. If closeOrder is set to true, the system will close the position and the position size will become 0. Side, Size and Leverage fields can be left empty and the system will determine the side and size automatically. |
| forceHold | boolean | A mark to forcely hold the funds for an order, even though it's an order to reduce the position size. This helps the order stay on the order book and not get canceled when the position size changes. Set to false by default. The system will forcely freeze certain amount of funds for this order, including orders whose direction is opposite to the current positions. This feature is to ensure that the order won’t be canceled by the matching engine in such a circumstance that not enough funds are frozen for the order. |
| marginMode | string | Margin mode: ISOLATED, CROSS, default: ISOLATED |
| price | string | Required for type is 'limit' order, indicating the operating price |
| size | integer | Order size (Lot), must be a positive integer. The quantity unit of coin-swap contracts is size(lot), and other units are not supported. |
| timeInForce | string | Optional for type is 'limit' order, [Time in force](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/doc-338146) is a special strategy used during trading, default is GTC |
| postOnly | boolean | Optional for type is 'limit' order,  post only flag, invalid when timeInForce is IOC. When postOnly is true, not allowed choose hidden or iceberg. The post-only flag ensures that the trader always pays the maker fee and provides liquidity to the order book. If any part of the order is going to pay taker fee, the order will be fully rejected. |
| hidden | boolean | Optional for type is 'limit' order, orders not displaying in order book. When hidden chose, not allowed choose postOnly. |
| iceberg | boolean | Optional for type is 'limit' order, Only visible portion of the order is displayed in the order book. When iceberg chose, not allowed choose postOnly. |
| visibleSize | string | Optional for type is 'limit' order, The maximum visible size of an iceberg order. please place order in size (lots), The units of qty (base currency) and valueQty (value) are not supported. |
| triggerStopUpPrice | string | Take profit price |
| triggerStopDownPrice | string | Stop loss price |

---
## Response Schema


**Response Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| code | string |  |
| data | object | Refer to the schema section of data |

**root.data Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| orderId | string | The unique order id generated by the trading system,which can be used later for further actions such as canceling the order. |
| clientOid | string | The user self-defined order id. |

# API Description

For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470620)

:::info[Description]
Cancel an order (including a stop order).

You will receive success message once the system has received the cancellation request. The cancellation request will be processed by matching engine in sequence. To know if the request has been processed, you may check the order status or update message from the websocket pushes.

The `orderId` is the server-assigned order id, not the specified clientOid.

If the order can not be canceled (already filled or previously canceled, etc), then an error response will indicate the reason in the message field.
:::

**API KEY PERMISSIONS**
This endpoint requires the Futures Trading permission.

**REQUEST URL**
This endpoint support Futures URL

**REQUEST RATE LIMIT**
Futures weight：1

# API Schema

## Request Schema


**Request Body**

---
  **None**  
---
## Response Schema


**Response Body**

---
**root Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| code | string |  |
| data | object | Refer to the schema section of data |

**root.data Schema**

| name | type | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| cancelledOrderIds | array | Refer to the schema section of cancelledOrderIds |

---

# API Description For the complete API documentation, please refer to [doc](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470614) :::info[Description] Add Isolated Margin Manually. ::: # API Schema ## Request Schema **Request Body** --- **root Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220) | | margin | number | Margin amount (min. margin amount≥0.00001667XBT） | | bizNo | string | A unique ID generated by the user, to ensure the operation is processed by the system only once, The maximum length cannot exceed 36 | --- ## Response Schema **Response Body** --- **root Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | code | string | | | data | object | Refer to the schema section of data | **root.data Schema** | name | type | description | | --- | --- | --- | | id | string | Position ID | | symbol | string | Symbol of the contract, Please refer to [Get Symbol endpoint: symbol](https://www.kucoin.com/docs-new/api-3470220) | | autoDeposit | boolean | Auto deposit margin or not | | maintMarginReq | string | Maintenance margin requirement

| | riskLimit | integer | Risk limit
| | realLeverage | string | Leverage o the order | | crossMode | boolean | Cross mode or not | | delevPercentage | number | ADL ranking percentile | | openingTimestamp | integer | Open time | | currentTimestamp | integer | Current timestamp
| | currentQty | integer | Current postion quantity | | currentCost | string | Current postion value | | currentComm | string | Current commission | | unrealisedCost | string | Unrealised value | | realisedGrossCost | string | Accumulated realised gross profit value | | realisedCost | string | Current realised position value | | isOpen | boolean | Opened position or not | | markPrice | string | Mark price | | markValue | string | Mark value
| | posCost | string | Position value | | posCross | string | added margin | | posInit | string | Leverage margin | | posComm | string | Bankruptcy cost | | posLoss | string | Funding fees paid out | | posMargin | string | Position margin | | posMaint | string | Maintenance margin | | maintMargin | string | Position margin | | realisedGrossPnl | string | Accumulated realised gross profit value | | realisedPnl | string | Realised profit and loss | | unrealisedPnl | string | Unrealised profit and loss | | unrealisedPnlPcnt | string | Profit-loss ratio of the position | | unrealisedRoePcnt | string | Rate of return on investment | | avgEntryPrice | string | Average entry price | | liquidationPrice | string | Liquidation price | | bankruptPrice | string | Bankruptcy price | | settleCurrency | string | Currency used to clear and settle the trades | ---
